description: Unique identifier for a repair reason category used to classify service events and reporting.
Human-readable description of the repair reason category presented in UIs and reports.
Flag indicating the reason is retired and should no longer be assigned to new service events.
Indicates whether costs tied to this reason are charged to an external party/department or treated as non-billable.
Links the reason to a maintenance/repair schedule grouping for planning and SLA rules; likely a foreign key to a schedule table; confirm with SME.
